It looks like your download is corrupt or incomplete. These stack traces show
corrupt plugin.xml and image files.  Can you check if the file sizes are what
they should be?

eclipse-platform-2.1-linux-motif.zip > 19,068,358 bytes
eclipse-JDT-2.1.zip > 11,469,215 bytes

Closing.  An email from the originator said the errors were caused by the unzip
utility used for unpacking the zip.
*** Bug 40728 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
